products.description:
MetaBoost is a unique vegan supplement designed with a focus on supporting 
      healthy blood sugar levels already within a normal range.
products.fullDescription:
You’ve probably heard that managing our blood 
      sugar, or blood glucose, is important for your health. Blood sugar 
      spikes and crashes can take a major toll on our energy, cognition, heart, 
      and overall well-being. NHT Global has developed a powerful tool to help you 
      maintain more stable blood sugar in the body. Using an effective and science-backed 
      silver fir extract from Slovenia, MetaBoost is a unique vegan supplement designed with a 
      focus on supporting healthy blood sugar levels already within a normal range. By helping 
      you get off the blood sugar rollercoaster, MetaBoost restores your body’s natural balance
       while optimizing your metabolism, cardiovascular health, and brain function. In other 
       words…MetaBoost is just the boost you need to stay healthy and vibrant!
keyBenefits: Maintains healthy blood sugar levels, already within a normal range
Vegan formula designed for daily use
products.cautions: Consult your healthcare professional before use if you are under medical supervision or allergic to any ingredients. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid storage in direct sunlight, high temperature or extreme humidity.
products.fdaDisclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

products.description: Premium collagen drink with marine peptides, hyaluronic acid, and vitamins to support glowing skin and healthy joints.
products.fullDescription: Wrinkles are little reminders of our aging. It’s OUR turn to remind the wrinkles that you can’t be labeled by age. Now enhanced with a delicious raspberry lemonade flavor, this premium collagen drink supplement packs a tasty punch of beauty-supporting nutrients to promote a more youthful you from the inside out. It’s made with incredibly powerful marine collagen peptides that are clinically proven to improve the appearance of skin’s hydration and elasticity while replenishing collagen levels. The formula also provides hyaluronic acid for increased moisture retention, Vitamin C to support collagen production, and MSM and chondroitin sulfate for joint and connective tissue support. The result? Glowing skin that you’ll love and healthier joints to support your active lifestyle. By boosting your health and appearance from within, our Collagen Supreme will help you look and feel younger from head to toe.
keyBenefits: Improves the appearance of skin elasticity and hydration
Diminishes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
Free of gluten, dairy, soy, artificial flavors, and artificial sweeteners
products.cautions: Not suitable for children, pregnant or nursing women. Consult your healthcare professional before use if you are under medical treatment or allergic to certain ingredients. Once opened, consume immediately. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place away from light and humidity.
products.fdaDisclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

products.description: Enhanced probiotic supplement with patented delivery system to support digestive and immune health.
products.fullDescription: “Bad bacteria” has finally met its match. NHT Global’s Enhanced Essential Probiotics helps support the health of our digestive system, protecting our immune system and safeguarding our intestinal tract from “bad bacteria.” Using a patented quadruple coating technology, Enhanced Essential Probiotics helps maintain the ecological balance of our intestinal system. It uses “good bacteria” to improve intestinal defense, relieve gastrointestinal discomforts, promote nutrient absorption and give overall peace of mind that our body is working hard for a healthy life.
keyBenefits: Helps facilitate the absorption of nutrients
Maintains optimal function of digestive system
products.cautions: Consult your healthcare professional prior to use if taking medication or if under medical care. Keep out of reach of children. Keep product out of direct sunlight, high temperature or extreme humidity.
products.fdaDisclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
patentsAndCertifications: Patented ingredient: Lactobacillus Rhamnosus (KR10-0646938 and KR10-007429)
Patented quadruple coating technology (KR10-1280232)
Certified by the Korean Ministry of Food and Drug Safety (MFDS)
products.directionsForUse: Consume contents of one stick pack per day after a meal. Children and elderly can consume with water.

products.description: Powerful eye support supplement with Lutemax®2020 and carotenoids to promote vision health and protect against blue light.
products.fullDescription: Very few of us are fortunate enough to have perfect 20/20 vision. And in an increasingly digital world, our eyes are now more challenged than ever before. To help protect one of our body’s most important assets, NHT Global has combined the world’s most eye-friendly nutrients in a single formula. Award-winning ingredient Lutemax®2020 and other beneficial carotenoids promote a healthy macula, assist visual performance and acuity, and help protect your eyes against harmful visible light and high-energy blue light. OcuFocus is the missing edge you need to maintain optimal long-term vision health!
keyBenefits: Supports eye health and vision function
Keeps eyes healthy as you age
Nourishes with carotenoids, antioxidants, and vitamins
Helps protect eyes against harmful visible and blue light
patentsAndCertifications: Lutemax®2020 patented in Europe (EP2473065B1), China (CN102481011), Australia (AU2010290970B2), Canada (CA2771967C), Japan (JP5778676B2), Korea (KR101479821B1)
Clinically proven to increase MPOD in as little as 8 weeks
Halal Certified
products.directionsForUse: Take one capsule up to two times daily.
products.cautions: If you are pregnant, lactating, or currently under medical supervision, please consult physician before using.
products.fdaDisclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

products.description: Cellular-level support supplement with bioactive ingredients like Avian Egg Extract and Organic Maca to rejuvenate and renew the body.
products.fullDescription: To help our bodies rejuvenate and renew, we need powerful nutrient support starting at the cellular level. NHT Global’s StemRenu® was created to deliver just that. It’s packed with specialized bioactive ingredients from around the world such as Avian Egg Extract and Organic Peruvian Maca that are designed to nourish and help restore the body to a more youthful and balanced state. From promoting faster recovery to countering the effects of stress, this supercharged formula arms the body with the tools it needs to achieve peak wellness and renewal.
keyBenefits: Improves occasional sleeplessness and promotes deeper, more restful sleep
Provides nutrient support for healthy cell signaling and overall cellular health
Supports bone, heart, and immune health
patentsAndCertifications: Bioperine® is patented for improvement of gastrointestinal absorption and systemic utilization (US Patents: US5536506, US6054585, US5744161, US5972382; European Patent: EP0810868; Canada Patent: CA2247467; Japan Patent: JP3953513)
Certified Organic Ingredients: AlgaeCal™, Aloe Vera, Maca, and Fucoidan Algae
Independently inspected for 500+ potential contaminants
products.directionsForUse: Take 1 – 2 capsule(s) daily based upon need or as directed by your healthcare professional. Consume with water or favorite beverage.
products.cautions: Keep out of reach from children. If you are pregnant, lactating, or under medical supervision, consult your physician before using. Do not consume if allergic to eggs or any component of this product.
products.fdaDisclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

products.description: Unique dietary supplement that promotes joint health and cartilage production.
products.fullDescription: Joint discomfort and stiffness can really alter the quality of life for many people. For some, the lack of Glucosamine the body produces is major contributor. Glucosamine 2200, NHT Global’s unique dietary supplement, creates building blocks to promote joint health and cartilage production. Our verified formula is made up of glucosamine for the friction between bones, shark cartilage for relief in the knee and back, green lipped mussel for cartilage repair, and turmeric for joint comfort. Our Glucosamine 2200 will help make for a healthier you!
keyBenefits: Directly supplies the body with glucosamine to help rebuild the body’s glucosamine and stimulate cartilage production
Promotes joint health, joint mobility and joint comfort
Contains turmeric extract, an antioxidant rich ingredient that studies have shown may promote joint comfort
Contains green lipped mussel, which supplements the body with omega 3 fatty acids, amino acids, and minerals
patentsAndCertifications: Halal Certified
products.directionsForUse: Adults take 1 capsule three times daily.
products.cautions: Keep out of reach from children. If you are pregnant, lactating, or currently under medical supervision, please consult physician before using.
products.fdaDisclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
products.allergyInfo: Contains shellfish (mussel, crab, shrimp) and fish (shark).

products.description: Ultra-pure fish oil packed with essential EPA and DHA to support multiple bodily functions.
products.fullDescription: NHT Global’s Omega-3 Essential Fatty Acids is an ultra-pure fish oil packed with good-for-you fats your body craves. Every serving provides an impressive 1,000mg of EPA and DHA, which are essential to the function of bodily systems such as the brain, heart, eyes, and joints. By taking Omega-3 Essential Fatty Acids every day, these delicious citrus flavored soft gels safeguard your health and keep your body working optimally from head to toe.
keyIngredients: Highly Refined and Concentrated Omega-3 Fish Oil
keyBenefits: Supportive but not conclusive research shows that consumption of EPA and DHA omega-3 fatty acids may reduce the risk of coronary heart disease
Supports a healthy weight and skin
patentsAndCertifications: Independently lab tested for 500+ potential contaminants
Certified by Friends of the Sea (FOS) for sustainability
Awarded the Symbol of National Quality (SNQ) in Taiwan
Halal Certified
products.directionsForUse: Adults: Take 2 soft gels daily, preferably 10 minutes before a meal. Do not exceed 8 soft gels daily unless under supervision. Children 4+: One soft gel daily.
products.cautions: Consult your healthcare professional before use if pregnant, lactating, suspect medical conditions, or taking prescription drugs. Do not consume if allergic to fish. Keep refrigerated.
products.fdaDisclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

products.description: Pure, USDA certified organic Noni Juice that supports immune function and promotes energy.
products.fullDescription: Time tested, nature approved. For thousands of years, Pacific Islanders have enjoyed the health benefits of the noni fruit. The noni fruit naturally provides vitamins, minerals, enzymes, antioxidants, phytonutrients, and bioflavonoids, and works at a cellular level in the body to support the natural function of the immune system. Our formula is USDA certified organic to assure utmost organic quality and integrity. Harvested in the clean air and rich soil of the famed Tahitian Ring of the South Pacific, NHT Global’s Premium Noni Juice is pure, delicious and great for you.
keyIngredients: Reconstituted Noni Fruit Juice from Organic Puree
keyBenefits: Supplies antioxidants known to help rid the body of harmful free radicals
patentsAndCertifications: USDA certified organic by QAI International
Manufacturer of the Year Award (2015) for innovation and quality in manufacturing
Export of the Year Award (2010) for excellence in exporting and contributions to the growth of the Samoan economy
Quality Crown Award (2004) for quality
Awarded the Symbol of National Quality (SNQ) in Taiwan
Halal Certified
products.directionsForUse: Shake well before using. Drink one ounce (30 ml) twice daily. Refrigerate after opening.
products.cautions: Consult your health care professional prior to use if you have or suspect a medical condition, are taking prescription drugs, or are pregnant or lactating. No product testing is performed on animals.
products.fdaDisclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

products.description: High-quality, 99% lactose-free whey protein powder supporting immune function and antioxidant protection.
products.fullDescription: The body is made up of billions of cells…cells that have the ability to heal themselves when in the optimum health environment. NHT Global’s Triotein is a high-quality, 99% lactose-free whey protein powder that provides amino acid substrates needed to stimulate the body’s production of intracellular glutathione peroxidase (GSH). GSH is a crucial, naturally-occurring antioxidant in the body that helps defend against toxins.
keyBenefits: Supports immune function and provides antioxidant support
Delivers 9g of non-GMO protein and 50% of your Daily Recommended Value of Vitamin D
patentsAndCertifications: Independently tested for 500+ environmental toxins
Halal Certified
products.directionsForUse: Mix one rounded scoop of Triotein with 8 oz. (250 ml) of water, juice or milk, preferably in the morning. Take up to three times a day or as recommended by your health practitioner. Preferable to not heat or cook product.
products.cautions: Pregnant or lactating women and persons with known medical conditions or allergies should consult a physician before taking this product. Keep out of reach of children.
products.fdaDisclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

products.description: Nutritional supplement targeting Calcium ATPase to support restful sleep, bladder function, muscle endurance, and joint comfort.
products.fullDescription: As we age, our levels of the essential enzyme Calcium ATPase decline, affecting bodily functions such as sleep, muscle fatigue, bladder activity, and joint comfort. ReStor Silver is formulated with dietary supplement grade ingredients to support the body's natural responses to stress and activity, promoting balance and health.
keyBenefits: Improves occasional sleeplessness and promotes deeper, more restful sleep
Improves muscle endurance, strength, and recovery
Promotes comfort and mobility in joints and muscles
patentsAndCertifications: Patented for the use of jasmones and jasmonates to improve bladder function (US Patent Nos. US9492403 & US8865660 and Chinese Patent Nos. CN103140223A & CN103429234A)
Halal Certified
products.directionsForUse: Adults take 1ml to 2ml daily, mixed in 4-6 oz of water or other liquid. Shake well before use.
products.cautions: If you are pregnant or lactating, or currently under medical supervision, consult a healthcare professional before using. Keep out of reach of children.
products.fdaDisclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

products.description: A 3-step skin care regimen to cleanse, firm, and moisturize, delivering visible anti-aging results in just 30 minutes.
products.fullDescription: Look and feel years younger with the Skindulgence 30 Minute Firming System. This exquisite 3-step regimen visibly lifts and tones to help you achieve maximum age-defying results. Improve skin tone, firmness, and facial muscle lift in the time it takes to get ready for bed.
keyBenefits: Gently cleanses, firms, and moisturizes skin
Improves appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
directionsForUse: Step 1 (Cleanser): Cleanse face with Cleanser. Rinse well.
Step 2 (Firming Masque): Apply Masque in upward and outward motions, let dry 20-25 minutes, then rinse.
Step 3 (Moisturizer): Apply Moisturizer in upward and outward direction.
cautions: For external use only.
Discontinue use if irritation or rash occurs.
Avoid contact with eyes.
products.fdaDisclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

products.description: A breakthrough serum to revive and strengthen hair from root to tip with a blend of 11 powerful nutrients.
products.fullDescription: This ultra-concentrated botanical blend nourishes weak, thinning hair for real and science-backed results. Featuring patented Redensyl™ Complex, caffeine, hyaluronic acid, and vitamin B5, it revitalizes hair follicles, improves hair density, and restores scalp moisture and balance.
patentsAwardsCertifications: Patented, clinically proven ingredient: Redensyl™ shown to reactivate hair follicles and improve hair density after 90 days of regular use
directionsForUse: Apply one dropper daily to wet or dry hair, morning or night.
Massage into the scalp.
Do not rinse.
Helpful Tips: Apply serum to problem areas first, then to the rest of the scalp.
Massage scalp for 2 minutes daily for best results.
cautions: Avoid contact with eyes. Rinse thoroughly with water if contact occurs.
For external use only.
Redensyl™ is a trademark of Givaudan.
products.fdaDisclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

products.description: An ultra-buttery hand cream that nourishes and hydrates to keep hands silky soft all day.
products.fullDescription: This luxurious formula is packed with exotic oils and natural botanicals including avocado oil, shea butter, and aloe vera to bring you luminous skin while shielding against environmental toxins. Infused with the comforting scent of vanilla.
products.freeOf: Parabens, phthalates, MEA, TEA, glycols, sulfates, and dyes
keyBenefits: Nourishes to keep hands silky soft and smooth all day
Packed with antioxidants to protect against harmful environmental pollutants
directionsForUse: Apply cream to hands and gently massage into skin until fully absorbed.
Use throughout the day as needed.
cautions: For external use only.
Keep out of reach of children.
products.fdaDisclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

products.description: A revolutionary cosmetic gel designed to refresh and moisturize skin with a cooling sensation.
products.fullDescription: Alura Lux features a patented combination of menthol and L-arginine based on the Nobel Prize-winning discovery of nitric oxide as a signaling molecule. This paraben-free gel provides an exhilarating 'cool tingling' sensation and is sold exclusively by NHT Global.
keyBenefits: Benefits multiple areas of the body depending on where it’s applied
patentsAwardsCertifications: Patented for the topical application of menthol and L-arginine (US Patent No. US6322493 and US6702733 and all foreign counterparts, International Patent Application No. PCT/US00/33987, European Patent No. EP1242009, Hong Kong Patent No.HK1051480, Chinese Patent No. CN1326503, and Brazil Patent No. BRPI0016619)
Halal Certified

ReStor Silver is formulated with dietary supplement grade ingredients to support the body's natural responses to stress and activity, promoting balance and health.
keyBenefits: Improves occasional sleeplessness and promotes deeper, more restful sleep
Improves muscle endurance, strength, and recovery
Promotes comfort and mobility in joints and muscles

Halal Certified

products.description: A 3-step skin care regimen to cleanse, firm, and moisturize, delivering visible anti-aging results in just 30 minutes.

Avoid contact with eyes.

Made with eight reinvigorating herbal extracts, NHT Global’s LivaPro helps protect the liver against free radicals, supports healthy liver function, promotes detoxification of unwanted substances, improves mood, and provides other uplifting benefits.

description: A revitalizing supplement to support kidney and respiratory health, while promoting restful sleep.
fullDescription: Your kidneys are responsible for nourishing your body and maintaining the body’s physiological balance. They are your body’s natural filter and help remove waste. Poor kidney health can cause a chain reaction to your body’s overall well-being. NHT Global has an amazing product to help maintain kidney health and improve occasional sleeplessness to promote deeper, more restful sleep. Cordyceps, a precious Chinese herb used for hundreds of years, contains unique adenosine & polysaccharides, 18 kinds of essential amino acids, vitamins and enzymes. Help your body perform the way it was intended with NHT Global’s Cordyceps Mycelia CS-4.
keyBenefits: Supports kidney health and respiratory health
Improves occasional sleeplessness and promotes deeper, more restful sleep

description: A bold and flavorful instant coffee supplement designed to enhance metabolism and support your weight management goals.
fullDescription: There’s nothing better than starting the day with a fresh cup of coffee. NHT Global has developed an instant coffee supplement that is even better for you and keeps you one step ahead on your weight management journey. Brimming with bold flavor, our TwinSlim Coffee provides the energizing kick of coffee that you love – but is enhanced with invigorating ingredients to help rev up your metabolism. It is infused with a premium blend of 5 fermented botanical extracts – including pomegranate, mulberry, sweet fennel, purslane, and bitter melon – to promote the breakdown of fat in the body and support a fitter physique. Our exclusive formula has also been enhanced with slimming ingredients like garcinia cambogia and white kidney bean to aid appetite control and encourage healthy weight maintenance. Whether you enjoy it served hot or chilled, TwinSlim Coffee offers the perfect pick-me-up to help you stay focused on your weight management goals and tackle every day head-on.
keyIngredients: Energy Support Botanical Fermented Blend (Fermented Asian Ginseng Root, Fermented Goji Berry Fruit)

Stir until dissolved.

description: A revitalizing liquid supplement designed to boost energy, stamina, focus, and cardiovascular health with only 10 calories per serving.
fullDescription: A busy life can leave you sluggish. That’s why we created LaVie+, a delicious supplement designed to help you conquer your day with clean energy and razor-sharp focus. It’s masterfully blended with revitalizing herbs and botanicals including red grapes, fresh ginseng, and CitriSlim® Ponkan unripe fruit to improve stamina while also supporting your heart, immunity, and healthy circulation. With only 10 calories and 1 gram of sugar per serving, LaVie+ gives you a healthy boost when you need it most so that you can do more of what you love. No wonder the word “LaVie” is French for ‘life.’ Each box of LaVie+ contains 30 packettes (15ml each).

description: A probiotic supplement designed to enhance fat reduction, improve digestion, and support a slimmer physique.
fullDescription: Struggling to meet your weight management goals? Meet your new sidekick: TwinSlim Probiotics. This effective formula combines clinically researched ingredients and patented probiotics designed to tackle fat reduction from every angle. From promoting fat burning to reducing fat absorption and formation, TwinSlim Probiotics maximizes your weight management efforts to support a slimmer physique. When used in combination with a healthy diet and regular exercise program, this delicious supplement gives you the spark you need to promote a healthier weight. Finally, there’s a targeted weight management solution that works as hard as you do.

description: A savory instant soup designed to curb cravings, support fullness, and promote healthy weight management on the go.
fullDescription: Maintaining a healthy weight isn’t just about eating less – it’s also about eating better. But making healthy food choices can be hard, especially when life gets busy. That’s why we’ve developed TwinSlim Tomato Soup to make it easier for you to stay committed to your weight management goals no matter how busy your day gets, and you can enjoy it anytime and anywhere. When hunger strikes, this delicious supplement provides instant nourishment and helps curb food cravings, leaving you feeling fueled and satisfied. It’s carefully formulated with award-winning ingredient SlimBiome® to improve satiety – helping you feel fuller for longer between meals and reducing the urge to overeat. It also delivers powerful benefits for your gut health and blood glucose levels to support weight management and overall body wellness. And with only 60 calories per serving, this means you can indulge in every savory sip without worrying about exceeding your daily caloric intake. Whether you’re between meetings or are simply on the go, TwinSlim Tomato Soup is a tasty way to maintain healthy habits and stay on track on your weight management journey, no matter how busy life gets.
keyBenefits: Supports balanced glucose already within normal levels
patentsAwardsCertifications: Award-winning and clinically proven ingredient: SlimBiome® is a patented prebiotic fiber and mineral complex that is shown in studies to support hunger-free weight management when combined with a calorie-controlled diet (Patent Nos.WO 2016/071693, WO2016071693A & WO/2019/021023).
Food Matters Live Best Functional Ingredient for Health and Wellbeing Award (2017)

The formula also contains lavender, lemon balm, and vitamin B6 to provide additional stress support, enhance your mood, and support more restful sleep. To help complement your diet, NHT Global’s CalComplex provides powerful daily support to help you meet your nutritional requirements and achieve optimal bone health. This proprietary formula is complete with high-quality calcium to help fortify your bones and teeth – plus other well-established vitamins and minerals like phosphorous, vitamin K, and vitamin D that deliver added bone support while enhancing calcium absorption in the body. fullDescription: When it comes to key nutrients we need for optimal wellness, the B vitamins are not to be overlooked. They are crucial for the body’s natural energy production and are an essential building block for our mood, nervous system, cardiovascular health, and more. To help make sure you are getting the proper balance of B vitamins, NHT Global’s Ultra B Complex is a great solution. Its proprietary time-release formula replenishes the body with a high concentration of all eight B vitamins to provide a strong foundation for our health – in addition to specialized phytonutrients like spirulina and ginkgo biloba to support your vitality and cognition. Consuming one to two tablets a day is a simple way to fill important nutrient gaps to keep you healthy – both mentally and physically. Unlock your potential with NHT Global’s Ultra B Complex. Each bottle contains 90 tablets.

description: A premium curcumin-based supplement that supports healthy aging, blood flow, and inflammatory response with powerful antioxidants.
fullDescription: While today’s life expectancy is higher than ever, many Americans are not seeing an improved quality of life in their advanced years. Designed to help you live your best life possible from age 20 to 100, NHT Global’s CurcuMore channels the impressive health boosting properties of curcumin to strengthen crucial functions needed for healthy aging. It’s formulated with a patented and clinically studied form of curcumin that is 31 times more bioavailable, making it more long-lasting and more effective than other curcumin products in the market. Combined with additional age-defying antioxidants such as green tea and grape seed extract, CurcuMore supports a normal healthy inflammatory response, promotes blood vessel health, encourages healthy blood flow, and protects against harmful free radicals to help you maintain a lifetime of vibrant health.

description: A revolutionary supplement using microclustered water to enhance cellular hydration, nutrient absorption, and detoxification.
fullDescription: NHT Global’s Cluster X2 has been created to benefit the body with increased and more efficient cell hydration. The clustered water, or ‘free’ water, can move freely through the cell walls and is instrumental to transport nutrients, remove waste, and maintain proper communication between the cells. Using a patented process, NHT Global’s Cluster X2 is purified water that has been raised to a high level of electromagnetic power. This active, highly mobile water helps deliver nutrients more quickly, hydrates more efficiently, and promotes cell waste removal much more effectively than the “bound” water most commonly found in older cell systems. So, drink up and live healthy!
keyBenefits: Promotes waste removal and elimination of toxins
Replenishes levels of clustered water in our bodies, which decline naturally as we age
patentsAwardsCertifications: Patented technology: Cluster X2 harnesses a patented treatment process to produce microclustered water (US Patent Nos. US6033678 and US5711950).
Clinically proven: In a 3-week study on healthy volunteers, the Cluster X2 formula hydrated three times more effectively than purified water.
directionsForUse: For ease of measuring, make one gallon of herbal supplement drink at a time by adding 2 tablespoons of Cluster X2 to one gallon of distilled water with a plastic spoon. DO NOT USE A METAL UTENSIL.
For best results, consume a minimum of 1 cup full (8 fluid ounces) of the mixed herbal supplement drink twice daily.
Store in a plastic container and refrigerate after mixing.

Sprinkle just one scoop of FibeRich over food or in your beverage of choice and feel better knowing you have improved your overall digestive health and well-being.

fullDescription: Treat your skin to the ultimate hydrating experience. NHT Global’s BioCell SC is a powerful multi-tasking facial mask infused with an ultra-moisturizing essence that instantly rejuvenates the appearance of tired and aging skin. Its patented coconut-juice derived biocellulose sheet delivers an arsenal of high performing plant and fruit extracts, amino acids, and antioxidants that work quickly to replenish moisture, brighten skin, and reduce the appearance of pores, fine lines, and wrinkles. Take your skin care regimen to new heights and discover a more youthful looking 'you' with BioCell SC.
